name: Ball To Be Free
description:
In this fast-paced arena game, you control a frenzy ball charging itself up and rushing at guards.

This ball is seeking its liberty. Nothing can take it away from its freedom, not even birds high up on sky. But, has it forgotten it was bounded to an inmate?

MOUSE AND KEYBOARD:

  • Mouse + Left Mouse Button : Spin it to charge the ball up
  • Space: Launch (The ball need to be charged)
  • Escape: Pause

CONTROLLER:

  • Left Stick: Spin it to charge the ball up
  • RT/R2:  Launch (The ball need to be charged)
  • Start Button: Pause
